admin.historyPostDeleted: Reputation points decreased for post deleted/hidden.
admin.historyPostCreated: Reputation points increased due to a post created.
admin.historyLikeSet: Reputation points increased for receiving a like.
admin.historyLikeUnset: Reputation points decreased for loosing a like.
admin.historyBestAnswerSet: Reputation points increased due to best answer received.
admin.historyBestAnswerUnset: Reputation points decreased due to best answer unassign.
admin.historyDiscussionCreated: Reputation points increased for creating a discussion.
admin.historyDiscussionClosed: Reputation points decreased because your thread was closed.

forum.reputationIncreasedNotification: Your reputation is growing. Keep it up!
forum.reputationDecreasedNotification: Oh no! Your reputation is going down!
